LineSelectTool - Class in metro.GameScreen.LineView
The LineSelectTool allows the user to create train lines by clicking on all the nodes this line should contain.

loadCursorImage() - Method in class metro.METRO
Loads the cursor image based on the operating system (setting default cursor doesn't work in windows -> loading the cursor as texture).
loadFonts() - Method in class metro.METRO
Load the font GatsbyFLF-Bold in size 21.
loadVisuals() - Method in class metro.METRO
Loads everything that has to do with visual things like textures and also the fonts.
